description: Enable discard option to allow auto space reclamation using UNMAP
Enable _netdev for iSCSI mount devices to allow network to be up before mounting device
Enable nobarrier to allow write barriers on SSD drives
Reduce latency by disabling contribution to randomness entroy pool for disk operations. Can be tuned by UDEV using 99-nimble-tune.rules
Request affinity of 2 is recommended to allow I/O completions on different CPU than submission CPU. Can be tuned by UDEV using 99-nimble-tune.rules
Scheduler noop is recommended to remove I/O request sorting overhead for SSD disks. Can be tuned by UDEV using 99-nimble-tune.rules
Set rotational to 0 to indicate SSD disks. Can be tuned by UDEV using 99-nimble-tune.rules
Set minimum I/O request allocations to 512. Can be tuned by UDEV using 99-nimble-tune.rules
Set maximum I/O request size to 4MB in case of sequential I/O. Can be tuned by UDEV using 99-nimble-tune.rules
Automatically startup and login to all discovered sessions during system reboot. Can be set in /etc/iscsi/iscsid.conf
Replacement_timeout of 10 seconds is recommended for faster failover of I/O by multipath on path failures. Can be set in /etc/iscsi/iscsid.conf
Minimum login timeout of 15 seconds is recommended with iSCSI. Can be set in /etc/iscsi/iscsid.conf
Minimum timeout of 10 seconds is recommended with noop requests. Can be set in /etc/iscsi/iscsid.conf
Minimum cmds_max of 256 is recommended for each session if handling multiple LUN's. Can be set in /etc/iscsi/iscsid.conf
Minimum queue_depth of 64 is recommended for each iSCSI session/path. Can be set in /etc/iscsi/iscsid.conf

Minimum number of sessions per iSCSI login is recommended to be 1 by default. If additional sessions are needed this can be set in /etc/iscsi/iscsid.conf. If NCM is running, please change min_session_per_array in /etc/ncm.conf and restart nlt service instead
product attribute recommended to be set to Server in /etc/multipath.conf
alua prioritizer is recommended. Can be set in /etc/multipath.conf
scsi_dh_alua device handler is recommended. Can be set in /etc/multipath.conf
immediate failback setting is recommended. Can be set in /etc/multipath.conf
immediately fail i/o on transient path failures to retry on other paths, value=1. Can be set in /etc/multipath.conf
queueing is recommended for 150 seconds, with no_path_retry value of 30. Can be set in /etc/multipath.conf
service-time path selector is recommended. Can be set in /etc/multipath.conf
vendor attribute recommended to be set to Nimble in /etc/multipath.conf
group paths according to ALUA path priority of active/standby. Recommended to be set to group_by_prio in /etc/multipath.conf
tur path checker is recommended. Can be set in /etc/multipath.conf
infinite value is recommended for timeout in cases of device loss for FC. Can be set in /etc/multipath.conf
Minimum queue_depth of 128 is recommended for Qlogic drivers. Set using modprobe.conf, rebuild initramfs and reboot system.
Minimum LUN queue_depth of 128 is recommended for Emulex drivers. Set using modprobe.conf, rebuild initramfs and reboot system.
Minimum HBA queue_depth of 8192 is recommended for Emulex drivers. Set using modprobe.conf, rebuild initramfs and reboot system.
Minimum LUN queue_depth of 64 is recommended for Cisco FC drivers. Set using modprobe.conf, rebuild initramfs and reboot system.
Minimum LUN queue_depth of 64 is recommended for Brocade FC drivers. Set using modprobe.conf, rebuild initramfs and reboot system.
